items.description: Certificate payload that will be used to verify group member peers

MemberPayloadCertificateAnchorUUID.description: An array of UUIDs referring to certificate payloads that will be used to authorize group member peer certificate identities. This array must contain all certificates needed to validate the entire chain of trust. Member certificates must have the common name prefix member (case insensitive).

OrganizationName.description: This name will be shown in the iOS login screen.

MemberIdentifiers.description: strings that refer to entries in the Users array that are members of the group.

Name.description: The display name of the group.

ConfigurationSource.description: the source that provided this group; e.g. iTunesU, SIS, or MDM.

ImageURL.description: URL of an image for the group.

BeaconID.description: unsigned 16 bit integer specifying this group’s unique beacon ID.

DeviceGroupIdentifiers.description: identifier strings that refer to entries in the DeviceGroups array that are device groups to which the instructor can assign users from this class.

LeaderIdentifiers.description: user identifiers that are leaders of this group.

Groups.description:
Shared: An array of dictionaries that define groups that the user can select in the login window.
                    Leader: An array of dictionaries that define the groups that the user can control.
                    Member: An array of dictionaries that define the groups of which the user is a member.

OrganizationUUID.description: This can be any valid UUID. All teacher and student devices that need to communicate with one another must have the same OrganizationUUID, particularly if they originated from different Device Enrollment Programs.

items.description: Certificate payload that will be used to authorize leader peers

LeaderPayloadCertificateAnchorUUID.description: An array of UUIDs referring to certificate payloads that will be used to authorize leader peer certificate identities. This array must contain all certificates needed to validate the entire chain of trust. Leader certificates must have the common name prefix leader (case insensitive).

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

SerialNumbers.description: strings containing the serial numbers of the devices in the group.

Identifier.description: uniquely identifies a device group in the organization.

Name.description: Will be displayed as the name of the device group, which must be unique in the organization

DeviceGroups.description: Leader: An array of dictionaries that define the device groups to which the leader can assign devices. This key is not included in member payloads.

Name.description: The display name of the department.

GroupBeaconIDs.description: group beacon identifiers that are members of this department.

Departments.description: Shared: An array of dictionaries that define departments that are shown in the iOS login window. Leader: An array of dictionaries that define departments that are shown in the Classroom app.

UserIdentifier.description: A unique string that identifies the user of this device within the organization.

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of an identity certificate payload that will be used to perform client authentication with other devices.

Identifier.description: uniquely identifies a user in the organization.

PasscodeType.description: The passcode UI to show when the user is at the login window

Name.description: The display name of the user.

ImageURL.description: A string containing a URL pointing to an image of the user. This image will be displayed in the iOS login screen and in the Classroom app. The recommended resolution is 256 x 256 pixels (512 x 512 pixels on a 2x device). The recommended formats are JPEG, PNG, and TIFF. The ResourcePayloadCertificateUUID identity certificate or the MDM client identity will be used to perform authentication when fetching the image.

FamilyName.description: will be displayed as the family name of the user.

FullScreenImageURL.description: URL pointing to an image of the user. The ResourcePayloadCertificateUUID identity certificate or the MDM client identity will be used to perform authentication when fetching the specified resource.

AppleID.description: the Managed Apple ID for this user.

GivenName.description: will be displayed as the given name of the user.

Users.description:
Shared: An array of dictionaries that define the users that are shown in the iOS login window.
                    Leader: An array of dictionaries that define users that are members of the leader’s groups.
                    Member: An array of dictionaries that must contain the definition of the user specified in the UserIdentifier key.
                    With one-to-one member devices, this key should include only the device user and the leader but not other class members.
